text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Alright, this year's 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' has a lineup of unique Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Last year, she showed incredible talent in several G1 races, Mejiro Palmer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Watch me, I'm going to carve the name 'Palmer' into this grand stage.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Go get 'em, Palmer!
This is her era now! Her condition is perfect, Ikuno Dictus!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: This time, I'll be the one to win it.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Show us your true power!
Her desire for the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' is stronger than anyone's, the top favorite, Mejiro McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For the pride of my Mejiro family... I cannot yield the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' to anyone.

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Looking forward to it again this year! Do your best!
And the embodiment of effort who captivated everyone's eyes in the 'Kikuka Sho,' Rice Shower!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san. I'm going to fight. I'm going to win...!

text_block_list.name: Spectator D
text_block_list.text: Rice can do it, she absolutely can!
And then, the bundle of potential, Matikanetannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nice to meet you!
(Murmur...!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Actually, I've been trimming my body for today! I'm fully pumped!

text_block_list.name: Spectator E
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's Matikanetannhauser! She was on the classic racing scene last year, right?

text_block_list.name: Spectator F
text_block_list.text: I've seen her post-race comments, they were good. She also ran pretty well in the 'Diamond S.'

text_block_list.name: Spectator E
text_block_list.text: Huh! Maybe she'll surprise us today?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright,
let's do this~!

text_block_list.name: Audience E
text_block_list.text:
Show us your power,
Matikanetannhauser!
Amidst the sparks flying between various Umamusume, the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' has finally begun...!
